remarks: Deduction for equality of functions.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
statement:
eqfnfvd.1 $e |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) $.
eqfnfvd.2 $e |- ( ph -> G Fn A ) $.
eqfnfvd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( F ` x ) = ( G ` x ) ) $.
eqfnfvd $p |- ( ph -> F = G ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d ph x $.
